data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Kurukshetra, Haryana, India. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kurukshetra, Haryana, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please give every church in the county of Kurukshetra a passion to plant another simple church.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Kurukshetra, Haryana, India, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Kurukshetra, Haryana, India.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Jat Pawania people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Spirit, teach the children in the county of Kurukshetra to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Father, convict the 10,612 believers in Kurukshetra to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Spirit, cause the 10,612 believers in Kurukshetra to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

location.name: Kurukshetra
location.people_groups_list: Kutana, Jat Chahil (Hindu traditions), Jat Phogat, Rajput Yadav, Sonar Ajudhyabansi (Muslim traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Kutana (521,000), Jat Chahil (Hindu traditions) (154,000), Jat Phogat (39,000), Rajput Yadav (9,600), Sonar Ajudhyabansi (Muslim traditions) (300)
